krpano.title: Virtual Tour

layer.name: welcome_button
layer.css: font-family:'Montserrat', sans-serif; font-size:18px; font-weight:bold; color:#FFFFFF; text-align:center; line-height:50px;

layer.name: scene_title_display
layer.css: font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-weight:500; color:#FFFFFF; text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); border-bottom: 1px solid #FFFFFF; display:inline-block;

layer.name: overview_button
layer.onclick: loadscene(scene_1_day, null, MERGE); set(layer[scene_title_display].html, 'OVERVIEW'); set(layer[scene_title_display].visible, true);
layer.onhover: set(layer[overview_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#000000');
layer.onout: set(layer[overview_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#FAF9F6');

layer.name: reception_button
layer.onclick: loadscene(scene_1_Reception_1, null, MERGE); set(layer[scene_title_display].html, 'RECEPTION'); set(layer[scene_title_display].visible, true);
layer.onhover: set(layer[reception_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#000000');
layer.onout: set(layer[reception_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#FAF9F6');

layer.name: banquet_dropdown_button
layer.onhover: set(layer[banquet_dropdown_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#000000');
layer.onout: set(layer[banquet_dropdown_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#FAF9F6');

layer.name: rooms_dropdown_button
layer.onhover: set(layer[rooms_dropdown_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#000000');
layer.onout: set(layer[rooms_dropdown_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#FAF9F6');

layer.name: scene_2_Banquet_Entrance_button
layer.onclick: loadscene(scene_banquet_1, null, MERGE); set(layer[scene_title_display].html, 'BANQUET HALL'); set(layer[scene_title_display].visible, true);

layer.name: scene_1_1CAFE_button
layer.onclick: loadscene(scene_1_1CAFE, null, MERGE); set(layer[scene_title_display].html, 'CAFE'); set(layer[scene_title_display].visible, true);
layer.onhover: set(layer[scene_1_1CAFE_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#000000');
layer.onout: set(layer[scene_1_1CAFE_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#FAF9F6');

layer.name: scene_Deluxe_Room_1_button
layer.onclick: loadscene(scene_Deluxe_Room_1, null, MERGE); set(layer[scene_title_display].html, 'DELUXE ROOM'); set(layer[scene_title_display].visible, true);

layer.name: scene_executive_room_2_button
layer.onclick: loadscene(scene_Executive_room, null, MERGE); set(layer[scene_title_display].html, 'EXECUTIVE ROOM'); set(layer[scene_title_display].visible, true);

layer.name: scene_Deluxe_Room_button
layer.onclick: loadscene(scene_JUNIOR_SUITE, null, MERGE); set(layer[scene_title_display].html, 'JUNIOR SUITE'); set(layer[scene_title_display].visible, true);
layer.onhover: set(layer[scene_Deluxe_Room_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#000000');
layer.onout: set(layer[scene_Deluxe_Room_button].css, 'font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size:16px; font-weight:400; color:#FAF9F6');
